posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade Old Mill T206 examples. Raw preferred but willing to purchase graded as well. Commons and HOF'ers. I also have a few extra T206/T210 for trade if that is preferred. Thank you for your time. 

Jason

Hello-  I have a T206 Oldring w/Old Mill back available in Good+ condition.  If interested, please let me know where you would like me to send the scans.  My email address is [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks,

Tom
